name: We Are Gods
description:
This is a game created as part of the Video Game Development Club at UCI. The basic story is that by starting the game you have awakened a few AI from their slumber, however, the plot was not able to be fully developed. The game itself is in a very unfinished (but playable) state and our group does not plan to continue development.

Credits:

Vivienne Ooi - Artist and Project Lead

Brenda Rendon - Artist

Roger Dalke (Me) - Programmer

Andrew Smith - Programmer

Jason Shuieh - Writer

Hamed Ghafarshad - Producer
